load packages
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(curl)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```


load the data
```{r}
gap <- read.csv(curl("http://bit.ly/gap_data"))
#Ex1
eu_52 <- gap %>%
filter(continent == "Europe", year == 1952)
ggplot(data = eu_52, aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp)) + geom_point()
#Ex2
```
